attributes.action: pass specific legislation so that employers can no longer discriminate against pregnant employees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is ridiculous in this day and age that pregnant females should be discriminated against by their employers. it should now become law that pregnant women have the same employment rights, as all other employees

rejection.details: Your petition has already been posted http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/pregdicrim/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
